name: Project Jangle
description:
Raise money for charity by increasing the generosity of your audience!

  • Features almost all Yogscast members.
  • Create streams with any combination of the featured Yogscast members.
  • Combine Yogscast members for powerful combos to generate more generosity.
  • Listen to a professional soundtrack made by Alex O'Neil.
  • Made by a single man.

Made for the Yogscast Game Jam.
